meanings.definition: A plant hormone that promotes cell division and growth.
meanings.sent1: The kinetin in the plant helped it grow taller and stronger.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use kinetin to make their crops grow faster.
meanings.sent3: The kinetin in the soil whispered to the seeds, encouraging them to sprout.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for gardening was like kinetin, sparking growth in the community.
meanings.sent5: The scientist observed the effects of kinetin under the microscope, amazed by its power to stimulate growth.

meanings.definition: A substance used in skincare products for its anti-aging properties.
meanings.sent1: The kinetin in the cream helped reduce wrinkles and fine lines.
meanings.sent2: Many people use kinetin to keep their skin looking young and healthy.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the kinetin in her lotion was the secret to her eternal youth.
meanings.sent4: The kinetin-infused serum was like a fountain of youth for her skin.
meanings.sent5: The advertisement promised that their product with kinetin would turn back the clock on aging skin.
